hero.title: Night of the Meteor
hero.subtitle: A Maniac Mansion Fan Remake
hero.description: Welcome to the Edison mansion, subject! Twenty years ago, a large meteor crash-landed in the Edison's front yard. Fascinating! The meteor was in fact the infamous Murderous Purple Slimy Meteor - observe! The terror of the galaxy itself! Using Dr. Fred as its instrument, the meteor has commenced swiping teenagers to extract their cerebral matter! The newest abduction involves Dave's girlfriend Sandy the cheerleader. Note: Not one to accept defeat, Dave enlists the assistance of colleagues and infiltrates the mansion to locate Sandy.
hero.descriptionSecondary: Welcome, fellow researchers! Explore the pixel art universe we are constructing in our laboratory! Scroll down to discover characters, villains, locations, animations, and music - observe the data!
hero.imageAlt: Night of the Meteor - Main Game Art

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Observe the cast of Night of the Meteor, my colleague! Each subject brings unique capabilities and behavioral patterns to the experiment... I mean, adventure!

dave.name: Dave
dave.description: The primary subject - you must utilize this specimen. No extraordinary abilities observed, but excellent audio accompaniment, fascinating!

bernard.name: Bernard
bernard.description: The resident technical specialist. Capable of repairing the radio apparatus to contact meteor enforcement and restoring telephone communications. Remarkable!

syd.name: Syd
syd.description: The cool musician with superior optical protection devices. Master of the piano instrument. Observe his technique!

razor.name: Razor
razor.description: The punk rocker specimen. Exceptional piano performance capabilities. Identical to Syd in every measurable aspect except gender classification. Fascinating anomaly!

michael.name: Michael
michael.description: The photographer who can process photographic film. The only subject who can persuade Weird Ed to assist you in the experiment. Note this variable!

wendy.name: Wendy
wendy.description: The writer who desires fame as a novelist. Capable of editing defective manuscripts using typewriter technology. Observe the process!

jeff.name: Jeff
jeff.description: Beach-dwelling subject whose sole ambition is vehicular habitation by the sea. Can restore telephone functionality. Minimal motivation, but useful!

villains.title: Villains
villains.description: Observe the antagonists of Night of the Meteor! Each presents unique experimental challenges and dark designs worthy of study, my colleague!

dr-fred.name: Dr. Fred Edison
dr-fred.description: Resident mad scientist controlled by the meteor specimen. Was not such a poor subject before the meteor assumed control. A cautionary tale!

edna.name: Nurse Edna Edison
edna.description: One demented specimen. The only Edison who will NEVER join your research team - avoid at all costs! Highly dangerous variable!

weird-ed.name: Weird Ed Edison
weird-ed.description: The military strategy specialist. The only mentally stable person in the mansion laboratory. Desires only meteor elimination and paternal rescue. Fascinating subject!

ted.name: Dead Cousin Ted Edison
ted.description: Technically never interacted with since deceased state achieved, but frequently mentioned throughout the mansion. Referenced specimen!

green-tentacle.name: Green Tentacle
green-tentacle.description: Too depressed to concern itself with intruders. Potentially useful ally, but exhibits manic-depressive tendencies and could become violent rapidly. Handle with caution!

purple-tentacle.name: Purple Tentacle
purple-tentacle.description: Guards the entrance to Dr. Fred's inner laboratory. Nearly all juvenile special abilities are designed for bypassing this specimen. Critical obstacle!

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Examine the detailed pixel art environments, my colleague! Each location is meticulously crafted to create an immersive experimental environment... adventure!

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: Pixel-perfect animated GIFs showcasing the game's dynamic moments and character movements. Observe the data, my colleague!

music.title: Music
music.description: The soundtrack that establishes the atmospheric conditions for Night of the Meteor! Each track enhances the pixel art experimental... adventure, my colleague!
